allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Donnerstagsspiel song matcher app

- Streamlit app for searching DJ song history
- Supabase backend for data storage
- Fuzzy search with pg_trgm
- Best Of rankings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add secrets debugging to diagnose cloud connection issue

- Show which source provided credentials \(st.secrets vs os.environ\)
- List all available secret keys
- Helps identify if secrets are configured correctly in Streamlit Cloud

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
